column2: We at Publicis Sapient are looking for Senior Associate Level 2 (Core Java + Microservices) to join our team of bright thinkers and doers. You will drive and translate our client's business problems into innovative technology solutions by creating and owning the technical vision of the project and ensuring that the vision is achieved with a high level of quality. You are a high-performance engineer expected to work in a product squad and deliver solutions for medium to large-scale clients.         Your Impact:           Responsible for programming as well as the design of the project and working with the design team and clients to create the needed artifacts.     Understands client business domain and has been part of projects with Digital Business Transformation (DBT) opportunity     Combine your technical expertise and problem-solving passion to work closely with clients, turning complex ideas into end-to-end solutions that transform our client s businesses.     Constantly innovate and evaluate emerging technologies and methods to provide scalable and elegant solutions that help clients achieve their business goals.     Responsible for choosing the needed technology stack based on the functional, and non-functional requirements and based on other factors like client drivers, environment, and feasibility         Your Skills & Experience:             Experience range: 7 - 9 years       Experience in developing micro services in Spring Boot. Experience in security, transaction, Idempotency, log tracing, distributed caching, monitoring and containerization requirements of Micro services. Experience in developing High Cohesion & Loosely Coupled Micro Services.     Hands on experience on Microservices Architecture.     Should have excellent acumen in Data Structures, algorithms, problem-solving and Logical/Analytical skills. Thorough understanding of OOPS concepts, Design principles and implementation of different type of Design patterns.     Sound understanding of concepts like Exceptional handling, Serialization/Deserialization and Immutability concepts, etc. Good fundamental knowledge in Enums, Collections, Annotations, Generics, Autoboxing, etc.     Experience with Multithreading, Concurrent Package and Concurrent APIs     Basic understanding of Java Memory Management (JMM) including garbage collections concepts.     Experience in RDBMS or NO SQL databases and writing SQL queries (Joins, group by, aggregate functions, etc.)     Hands-on experience with Massage Broker like Kafka or other. Hands-on experience in creating RESTful webservices and consuming webservices. Hands-on experience with spring Cloud/Spring Boot.     Hands-on experience with any of the logging frameworks (SLF4J/LogBack/Log4j)     Experience of writing Junit test cases using Mockito / Powermock frameworks. Should have practical experience with Maven/Gradle and knowledge of version control systems like Git/SVN etc.     Hands on experience on Cloud deployment/development.           Set Yourself Apart With:           Any Cloud Certification     Distributed computing,     Building scalable systems,     UX areas like ReactJS, NodeJS, Webflux etc.         Education   :     Bachelor s/Master s Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field

column2: What youll be doing... As the leader in the Verizon GTS - Network Systems organization in Verizon India, you will have full responsibility for the Shared Platforms domain covering both Wireline and Wireless services and supporting Verizons Strategic Programs. The role involves building and managing the Platforms and Systems that serve a reusable and common purpose across the organization. You will be responsible for building a highly motivated and talented team, coaching and mentoring them to deliver high quality products and services. You will partner with business units to establish goals, influence and effectively communicate the vision jointly set with Senior Leadership.  Building, managing and optimizing the organization's technology infrastructure in building a common scalable and robust platform as a service. Driving the strategy and execution of building reusable low code products and features for driving faster time to market, to improve developer efficiency and optimize cost Driving the user adoption strategy of the horizontal technology products and capabilities in the organization partnering with the leadership in IT and business. Building a self-organizing high performing team with a product mindset. Fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration and continuous learning. Evaluating emerging technologies, orchestrate rapid proof of concepts and provide recommendations for adoption. Defining resource capacity plans, staffing and operations; making decisions regarding hiring, promotion and disciplinary actions. Coach, train and motivate the team to achieve subject matter expertise. Building good working relationships with third party partners, suppliers and industry solution providers, and leverage the partnerships to the best advantage of providing business and technological advancements resulting in great customer experience for Verizon Customers. Partnering with business units to establish goals, influence and effectively communicate the vision set by the Senior Leadership. Ensuring that the systems are robust, scalable, reusable, cloud native, and 24/7 availability. Delivering results within budget, time, quality and strategic and tactical key performance goals. What were looking for... This position requires a dynamic individual with strong leadership skills, with a deep understanding of technology trends, and the ability to align technology initiatives with business objectives. Strong Experience in ReactJS/AngularJS, React Native, Springboot, PostGresSQL, Redis, AWS, K8S, BPM technologies.  Strong proficiency in leading horizontal technology solutions, low-code/no-code capabilities and understands the DNA needed to strategize and execute. Demonstrative experience in collaborating and driving large enterprise scale programs involving cross-functional teams with/without direct reports. Ability to lead from the front in an ambiguous dynamic environment and thrive Very good in storytelling to the leadership, on complex technical concepts aligned with the business needs. Youll need to have: Bachelors or Masters degree or four or more years of work experience. Six or more years of experience in technology leadership, including solid understanding of technology selection, architecture, and full stack implementation. Six or more years of direct people management experience, including leadership of diverse global teams. Experience in delivering Microservices architecture, digital technologies and platforms, large-scale migration from legacy to directional platforms. Ability to meet timelines, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and to work in a fast-paced, dynamic, customer and team-oriented work environment. Strong presentation skills to communicate complex concepts effectively. Experience leading senior talent, mentoring and coaching. Industry recognition, patents & papers, participation in standards/ professional bodies Even better if you have one or more of the following: Understanding of latest cutting edge technologies like GenAI, and enthusiasm to drive next gen solutions. Industry recognition, patents & papers, participation in standards/ professional bodies If Verizon and this role sound like a fit for you, we encourage you to apply even if you dont meet every even better qualification listed above. Where youll be working In this hybrid role, you'll have a defined work location that includes work from home and assigned office days set by your manager. Scheduled Weekly Hours 40

Develops basic to moderately complex code using front and / or back end programming languages within multiple platforms as needed in collaboration with business and technology teams for internal and external client software solutions. Designs, creates, and delivers routine to moderately complex program specifications for code development and support on multiple projects/issues with a wide understanding of the application / database to better align interactions and technologies.                      Analyzes, modifies, and develops moderately complex code/unit testing in order to develop concise application documentation. Performs testing and validation requirements for moderately complex code changes. Performs corrective measures for moderately complex code deficiencies and escalates alternative proposals.                Participates in client facing meetings, joint venture discussions, vendor partnership teams to determine solution approaches.                Provides support to leadership for the design, development and enforcement of business / infrastructure application standards to include associated controls, procedures and monitoring to ensure compliance and accuracy of data. Applies a full understanding of procedures, methodology and application standards to include Payment Card Industry (PCI) security compliance.                      Conducts and provides basic billable hours and resource estimates on initiatives, projects and issues.                      Assists with on-the-job training and provides guidance to other software engineers.                        What Are We Looking For in This Role?                        Minimum Qualifications                            BS in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business / Management Information Systems or related field                          Typically minimum of 4 years - Professional Experience In Coding, Designing, Developing And Analyzing Data.    Typically has an advanced knowledge and use of one or more front / back end languages / technologies and a moderate understanding of the other corresponding end language / technology from the following but not limited to; t        wo or more modern programming languages used in the enterprise, e      xperience working with various APIs, external Services, e      xperience with both relational and NoSQL Databases.                            Preferred Qualifications                            BS in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business / Management Information Systems or related field                          6+ years professional Experience In Coding, Designing, Developing And Analyzing Data and experience with IBM Rational Tools                          What Are Our Desired Skills and Capabilities?                                        Skills / Knowledge - A seasoned, experienced professional with a full understanding of area of specialization; resolves a wide range of issues in creative ways. This job is the fully qualified, career-oriented, journey-level position.                                          Job Complexity - Works on problems of diverse scope where analysis of data requires evaluation of identifiable factors. Demonstrates good judgment in selecting methods and techniques for obtaining solutions. Networks with senior internal and external personnel in own area of expertise.                      Supervision - Normally receives little instruction on day-to-day work, general instructions on new assignments. column2: Lead multiple teams of 10-15 top-notch engineers to own, drive and deliver critical parts of our products.     Work closely with Engineering Managers to develop the best technical design and approach for new product development.     Set up the organization processes to enable timely delivery of projects with high quality.     Ensure quality at every level be it problem-solving, design, code, or bug fixes.     Oversee Architecture design of technically robust, flexible, and scalable solutions.     Engage with product management and CTO office team to drive the functionality, usability, and other non-functional requirements and hence the solution for the same.     Ensure on-time launches by managing design, development, and integration efforts according to a standard or customised project plan.     Be a champion of engineering excellence: establish team metrics for measurement of engineering and operational excellence.     Implement a consistent, regular process for assessment and improvement.     Show strong business and technical judgment that will accelerate the time to market of releases, while incrementally moving our services towards the long-term vision.     Be responsible for mentoring and developing front-line managers and engineers.             Requirements             Must have at least 3-5 years of experience working at a startup.     10+ years of work experience in software development and 5+ years in a leadership role.     Experienced on microservices-based architecture.     Experience in building and running distributed systems for 24x7 online services at scale.     Deep understanding expertise with highly transactional, large relational, and complex systems.     Knowledge of Object-Oriented Design, data structures, algorithm design, and complexity analysis.     Experience in defining and executing professional software engineering best practices for the full software development life cycle.     Strong analytical and quantitative skills; ability to use hard data and metrics to back up assumptions, and recommendations, and drive actions.     Strengths in problem-solving, issue resolution, ability to work in a deadline-driven work environment, attention to detail, and ability to multitask.     Strong verbal and written communication skills with demonstrated experience.     Engaging and influencing peers and executives.     A strong sense of ownership, urgency, and drive.     Being a strong leader, mentor, and people manager.     Investing in continuous learning and improvement.     Execution oriented.     Ability to think big.     Collaborative mindset. column2: As an Oracle Database Developer Lead, you will be a key member of our technology team, responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing Oracle databases. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams, ensuring best practices, and delivering high-quality solutions. Your key responsibilities : Design databases that are functional, dependable, and stable. Develop and maintain database schemas, tables, views, and indexes. Implement data security measures and access controls. Optimize SQL queries, database structures, and indexing for maximum performance. Monitor and analyze database performance metrics. Implement performance tuning techniques to enhance system responsiveness. Maintain and improve existing database systems. Execute tests and update databases in accordance with requests. Cooperate with programmers to enhance applications and establish best practices. Investigate and resolve complex database issues escalated from L2 support. Provide Level 4 support to the production team. Troubleshoot and address database usage problems and malfunctions. Design and develop new features and functionality. Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements. Build and deploy monthly release artifacts for production. Maintain detailed documentation of database designs, changes, and optimizations. Share knowledge with team members and contribute to internal knowledge bases. Proficiency in Oracle Database administration and development. Expertise in SQL and PL/SQL coding. Familiarity with Java , data structures, and algorithms. Techniques to tune software for maximum performance. Understanding of UNIX environments. Proven ability to design and deliver robust database solutions. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Experience with  version control systems (e.g., Git). Ability to analyze complex issues logically and propose effective solutions. Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Exposure to Agile methodologies  and  DevOps practices .

Manage coordination across various technical and functional teams. Experience in CMDB, Discovery and integration with other external modules is essential. column2: Williams Lea is hiring Head of development . Work Location - Chennai/Kochi (Hybrid work - 2 days in office) Role Purpose:  As the Head of Development, you will lead the strategic direction and management of our full stack development initiatives, encompassing UI, Application, backend/endpoint, AI, ML, and Software DBA. This pivotal role demands a seasoned professional with extensive experience in management, a deep understanding of cutting-edge technologies and frameworks, as well as proficiency in DevSecOps, Agile/Scrum methodologies, and driving SDLC best practices. Additionally, you will be responsible for delivering industry-leading KPIs to evaluate the efficiency, effectiveness, and quality of the development process. The ideal candidate will be a visionary leader capable of driving innovation, fostering collaboration, and ensuring the delivery of high-quality, scalable solutions. If you possess a passion for pushing the boundaries of technology and leading dynamic teams, we invite you to join us in shaping the future of our development landscape. Responsibilities: Leadership      and Strategy: Develop       and execute a comprehensive development strategy aligned with       organizational goals and industry best practices. Provide       visionary leadership to the development team, fostering a culture of       innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement. Drive       the adoption of emerging technologies and methodologies to enhance       development processes and outcomes. Implement       automation tools and processes to streamline development workflows,       increase productivity, and enhance code quality. Full      Stack Development: Oversee       the end-to-end development lifecycle, including UI design, backend       architecture, AI/ML integration, and software database administration. Collaborate       with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy scalable and       robust solutions that meet business requirements. Ensure       the optimization of performance, security, and scalability across all       development initiatives. Team      Management and Development: Build       and lead a high-performing development team, providing mentorship,       guidance, and professional development opportunities. Foster       a culture of accountability, transparency, and continuous learning within       the development organization. Manage       resource allocation, staffing, and talent acquisition efforts to support       project needs and growth objectives. Mentor team members       on DevSecOps principles, Agile methodologies, and SDLC best practices,       fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement. Technology      Expertise: Demonstrate       expertise in cloud technologies, including Azure, GCP, and AWS, to       architect and deploy scalable cloud-based solutions. Possess       proficiency in programming languages such as Java, C#, Python, or       JavaScript, and frameworks/libraries including Spring Boot, .NET Core,       React, or Angular. Stay       abreast of emerging technologies, trends, and best practices in       DevSecOps, Agile development, and software engineering, and apply them to       drive innovation and efficiency within the organization Collaboration      and Stakeholder Engagement: Collaborate       closely with product management, engineering, and other stakeholders to       define requirements, prioritize initiatives, and ensure alignment with       business objectives. Serve       as a key liaison between development, operations, and business       stakeholders, facilitating communication and fostering productive       relationships. KPI      Reporting Responsible       for delivering industry-leading KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) to       evaluate the efficiency, effectiveness, and quality of the development       process. Develop       and maintain metrics to measure and optimize key aspects of the       development lifecycle, such as Cycle time, change rate failure, defect       escape rate, development throughput, efficiency, and code quality, into       clear insights, utilizing visualizations and contextual analysis. Tailor       reports to various stakeholders, highlighting trends and promoting       transparency to drive continuous improvement. Qualifications: Bachelors      or Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. 10+      years of experience in software development, with a focus on full stack      development and 5+ years in a senior management or leadership role. Proven      track record of successfully leading and delivering complex development      projects on time and within budget. Extensive      experience with cloud technologies such as Azure, GCP, and AWS, including      cloud architecture design and deployment. Proficiency      in programming languages such as Java, C#, Python, or JavaScript, and      frameworks/libraries including Spring Boot, .NET Core, React, or Angular. Strong      understanding of AI/ML concepts and their application within software      development. Excellent      leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to      inspire and motivate teams. Proficient      in implementing and managing DevSecOps practices, ensuring the seamless      integration of security measures throughout the development lifecycle. Experienced      in Agile/Scrum methodologies, adept at fostering collaboration, iteration,      and continuous improvement within cross-functional teams. Skilled      in driving SDLC (Software Development Lifecycle) best practices, including      requirement analysis, design, development, testing, deployment, and      maintenance. Strategic      thinker with a passion for driving innovation and continuous improvement. Location:  This position is based at our Chennai / Kochi office and may require occasional travel. Benefits: Competitive      salary and comprehensive benefits package. Opportunity      to work with cutting-edge technologies and drive innovation. Dynamic      and collaborative work environment with opportunities for professional      growth and development.

column2: The Merchant Experience team at Recharge is responsible for building, scaling, and maintaining merchant administration user experiences        The merchant experience ecosystem sits at the intersection of many core product feature areas that help merchants manage orders, subscriptions, customers, products, discounts, bundles, collections, and more      This is a high-impact, high-visibility feature team and will keep you very close to the end user experiences        In this role, you will be a core contributor to ensuring the merchant experience is one that is modern, performant, and reliable for merchant administrators      You will develop, maintain, and debug features across the merchant experience stack, enabling product vision to come to life      You will collaborate to clarify, theorize, figure out, and decide solutions to complex problems closely with your team      Ensuring the team delivers will be critical to our success, which will require thorough code reviews, quality releases, and being in an on-call rotation        As a core engineer of the team, you will take on shared ownership of the merchant experience ecosystem to govern the best practices for component contributions, architecture patterns, and enabling other feature teams to develop quickly                  Our Tech Stack:        Python, Flask, React with Remix and Chakra UI, Vue.js, GCP, Elasticsearch, Redis, SaaS, CloudSQL/MySQL, Terraform, OpenTelemetry, Docker, Kubernetes, Splunk, SignalFx, Sentry, New Relic            Who you are                    You love remote work, but not working alone. You love not commuting to work, but you also love collaborating to clarify, confirm, theorize, figure out, and decide on solutions to problems              You love tackling challenges on different fronts like code, infrastructure, documentation, and evangelizing new testing tools and methodologies              You love the fast-paced nature of the eCommerce world              You love rapid iterative design, testing, and development while gaining context and understanding along the way. You can recognize when you know enough to take the next useful step to deliver value.              You are good with working around existing systems and developing creative solutions to new and difficult problems.                    What you'll do                Live by and champions all of our core values (#accountability, #collaboration, #iteration, and #details)              Build, maintain, and debug high-impact product features within the merchant experience ecosystem              Perform thorough code reviews and provide constructive feedback              Embrace rapid iterative design, testing, and development to gain context and understanding along the way informing the next useful step in delivering value              Develop proof of concepts and incremental features within the merchant experience ecosystem, while ensuring contributions meet Recharge design and code standards              Investigate, analyze, and evangelize programming methodologies              Champion good habits (development techniques, security, and tech debt balance) amongst your peers while advocating for improved engineering standards, tooling, and processes              Collaborate with product and engineering management to inform roadmap timeline and identify approaches to release product features incrementally              Participate in all phases of the Product Development Lifecycle with product and engineering management to inform technical viability of product and engineering initiatives for key stakeholders                    What you ll bring                5+ years of relevant development experience in fast-paced environments              Willingness to learn and experiment to reach a desired outcome              A knack for engineering simple solutions to solve complex problems iteratively              Experience building, launching, and supporting new product features              Self-driven; column2: The AWS Cloud Tower Lead with Solution Architect and FinOps knowledge is responsible for leading the design, implementation, and optimization of cloud infrastructure solutions on the AWS platform. This role requires a deep understanding of AWS services, architectural best practices, and financial management principles to ensure efficient and cost-effective use of cloud resources.                 Responsibilities:                 Cloud Infrastructure Design and Architecture:                     Lead the design and implementation of scalable, secure, and highly available cloud infrastructure solutions on AWS.                 Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and define architectural patterns that meet business needs.                 Ensure adherence to AWS Well-Architected Framework principles and best practices for reliability, performance, security, and cost optimization.                     Solution Architecture:                     Act as a technical advisor, providing guidance and recommendations on architecture design, service selection, and technology stack.                 Develop architectural diagrams, documentation, and presentations to communicate design decisions and rationale to stakeholders.                 Conduct architectural reviews and assessments to identify areas for improvement and optimization.                     Financial Optimization (FinOps):                     Implement cost optimization strategies to maximize the value of cloud investments while minimizing expenses.                 Analyze cost and usage data using AWS Cost Explorer, Trusted Advisor, and third-party tools to identify cost-saving opportunities.                 Develop and implement tagging strategies, budget controls, and reserved instance planning to optimize spending.                     Cloud Governance and Compliance:                     Establish governance policies and controls to ensure compliance with industry standards, regulatory requirements, and organizational policies.                 Implement security best practices, encryption standards, and access controls to protect sensitive data and resources.                 Monitor and enforce compliance with AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies, network configurations, and data protection measures.                         Team Leadership and Collaboration:                     Lead a team of cloud engineers and architects, providing mentorship, guidance, and technical oversight.                 Foster a collaborative environment, promoting knowledge sharing, continuous learning, and cross-functional teamwork.                 Coordinate with other IT teams, such as DevOps, security, and application development, to align cloud initiatives with overall business objectives.                     Skills and Qualifications:                 AWS Expertise:                       In-depth knowledge of AWS services, including      compute     , storage, networking, database, and security.                   Hands-on experience with AWS management tools, such as AWS Management Console, AWS CLI, and AWS CloudFormation.                     Architecture Design:                     Strong understanding of cloud architecture principles, including microservices, serverless computing, and containerization.                 Experience designing fault-tolerant, scalable, and resilient cloud solutions using AWS services like EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and ECS.                     Financial Management (FinOps):                     Familiarity with FinOps principles and practices for optimizing cloud spending and maximizing ROI.                 Proficiency in analyzing cost and usage data, implementing cost-saving strategies, and monitoring cloud economics.                     Leadership and Communication:                     Excellent leadership skills with the ability to lead and motivate a team towards achieving common goals.                 Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels of the organization.                     Problem Solving and Decision Making:                     Analytical mindset with the ability to assess complex problems, evaluate alternative solutions, and make informed decisions.                 Proven track record of troubleshooting technical issues, resolving challenges, and driving continuous improvement.                         Certifications:                       AWS certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect, AWS Certified      SysOps     Administrator, or AWS Certified DevOps Engineer are highly desirable.

column2: Project Role : Application Lead Project Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.  Must have skills : Node.js, JavaScript, Amazon Web Services (AWS) Good to have skills : NA Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 years full time education Summary :As an Application Lead, you will be responsible for designing, building, and configuring applications using Node.js. Your typical day will involve leading the effort to develop and deploy applications, acting as the primary point of contact, and utilizing your expertise in JavaScript and Amazon Web Services (AWS).  Roles & Responsibilities:1 Develop and maintain server-side applications using Node.js. 2 Proficiency in JavaScript, ES6+ features and asynchronous programming. 3 Optimize database performance and work with various database systems such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Redis. 4 Proficiency in Node.js frameworks like Express.js, Nest.js.5 Strong knowledge on RESTful API design. 6 Git expertise and experience with codebase management using Github.7 TDD/BDD using Jest, Mocha, Sinon. 8 Understanding of front-end technologies and their integration. 9 Proven experience with setting up CI/CD pipelines with jenkins. Monitor, troubleshoot, and maintain production systems using monitoring tools like New Relic.10 Should have 5 plus years of experience in Node JS.  Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Node.js, JavaScript, and Amazon Web Services (AWS). Strong understanding of software engineering principles and best practices. Experience with agile development methodologies and tools. Solid grasp of database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and React. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Node.js, JavaScript, and Amazon Web Services (AWS). The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful software solutions. Shift Timings:12 PM to 10 PM. Qualification 15 years full time education

column2: Engineer is responsible for managing or performing work across multiple areas of the bank's overall IT Platform/Infrastructure including analysis, development, and administration. It may also involve taking functional oversight of engineering delivery for specific departments. Planning and developing entire engineering solutions to accomplish business goals. Building reliability and resiliency into solutions with appropriate testing and reviewing throughout the delivery lifecycle Ensuring maintainability and reusability of engineering solutions. Ensuring solutions are well architected and can be integrated successfully into the end-to-end business process flow. Reviewing engineering plans and quality to drive re-use and improve engineering capability. Participating in industry forums to drive adoption of innovative technologies, tools and solutions in the Bank Your key responsibilities A Java React Full Stack developer is responsible for designing, building, implementing, and maintaining software applications using both Java and React technologies. Responsible for developing front-end interfaces with React.js, building back-end services with Java, integrating APIs, ensuring cross-platform optimization, and collaborating with team members to deliver high-quality software solutions. Should have proficiency in both Java and React, as well as strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in an Agile development environment. Your skills and experience 10+ years experience in implementing software applications using Java & React Technologies. Hands-on experience with React.js: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, providing a component-based architecture for creating reusable UI elements. HTML/CSS: Fundamental web technologies for structuring and styling web pages. JavaScript (ES6+): The primary programming language for building dynamic and interactive web applications. Redux: A predictable state container for managing application state in complex React applications. Bootstrap or Material-UI: CSS frameworks for creating responsive and visually appealing user interfaces. Axios or Fetch API: JavaScript libraries for making HTTP requests to backend services or APIs. Hands-on experience with Java: A popular object-oriented programming language used for building scalable and robust backend services. Spring Boot: A framework for building Javabased enterprise applications, providing features such as dependency injection, MVC For internal use only architecture, and RESTful web services. Hibernate or Spring Data JPA: Object-relational mapping (ORM) frameworks for simplifying database interactions and managing entity relationships. Spring Security: A framework for implementing authentication and authorization mechanisms in Spring-based applications. RESTful APIs: Architectural style for designing networked applications, allowing communication between the front-end and backend components. Database: SQl/PLSQL for commonly used databases include Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB, depending on the specific requirements of the application. Developer tools & Practices: Integrated Development Environment (IDE): Such as IntelliJ IDEA or Eclipse for Java development, and Visual Studio Code or WebStorm for React development. Version Control: Git for managing source code and collaborating with team members. Build Tools: Maven or Gradle for managing dependencies and building Java projects, and Webpack for bundling and optimizing React applications. Testing Frameworks: JUnit for unit testing Java code, Jest and Enzyme for testing React components, and Selenium for automated browser testing. Agile Methodologies: Practices like Scrum or Kanban for iterative and collaborative software development. Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Tools like Jenkins, Travis CI, or GitLab CI/CD for automating the build, testing, and deployment processes. Good working knowledge of various async messaging streams such as Kafka, Rabbit MQ, IBM MQs etc. Experience with building distributed large scale low latency application is desirable. Good understanding of implementing various design patterns to improve application performance. Good understanding of various Object-Oriented Design principles such as SOLID, DRY, KISS etc. Knowledge of Compute Engine for virtual machines, Cloud Storage for object storage, and Cloud Functions for serverless computing, GKE for GCP is desirable. Strong stakeholder management skills and the ability to communicate at senior level. Proven experience of delivering results in matrixed organizations under pressure and tight timescales Excellent verbal, interpersonal and written communication skills. Bachelors degree in computer science or a related field

column2: We are looking for a JIRA engineer to join the IT team. The SentinelOne IT teams mission is to provide highly reliable and innovative services to the enterprise. The JIRA engineer will be part of a small team that manages all aspects of our JIRA software suite (Confluence, Software, and Service Management). This position will focus on creating standard JIRA services across the different JIRA platforms. Standard services will allow IT and its services to scale as the business groups. Part of the service delivery model will include a power user approach for the business partners. The power users approach will allow for some light weight configuration capabilities which will allow the business to make changes at the speed they wish to run while ensuring that the platform is secure and has high availability.           What will you do?           Work closely with stakeholders to successfully complete IT infrastructure & development projects.         Hands-on experience with Linux and SQL skills         Create complex JIRA Automation Rules, project workflows, field configurations, screen schemes, permission schemes and notification schemes         Manage use/group permissions and project roles         Understands organizational and business functions and makes sound decisions.         Maintain the complete Jira and Confluence instance in an efficient way so that it can be able to integrate with other Atlassian and 3rd party applications.         Improve the existing Jira instance performance.         Create and support the Confluence spaces and role based access.         Manage system access and permissions configurations to ensure compliance and enforce best practices         Create, manage and support on how to leverage Atlassian APIs for users to automate manual processes, implement business processes and extract data for reporting and analytics purposes         Support teams and senior executives with their reporting needs by developing dashboards directly in Jira.         Consult, coach, and train key users and business stakeholders on best practices in using the tools to better perform their Scrum roles         Contribute with your experience in creating processes and documentation for day to day administration activities for the rest of the team and project leads           What skills and knowledge should you bring?           5+ years of experience working in a Jira Engineer/Administration role         Experience with JQL, Groovy, JavaScript and REST APIs         Hands-on experience in plugins such as ScriptRunner, Configuration Manager, Automation for Jira, Portfolio/BigPicture, etc.         Experience managing both Software and Service Desk Projects in a Cloud environment         Experience migrating Jira data from Atlassian Cloud to On-Prem and from On-Prem to Cloud         Experience merging multiple Atlassian Cloud instances and multiple On-Prem instances         Extensive experience managing enterprise Confluence environment         Experience integrating JIRA and Confluence with multiple collaboration, messaging and project management tools. column2: Project Role : Application Lead Project Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.  Must have skills : Node.js, JavaScript, Amazon Web Services (AWS) Good to have skills : NA Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 years full time education Summary :As an Application Lead, you will be responsible for designing, building, and configuring applications using Node.js. Your typical day will involve leading the effort to develop and deploy applications, acting as the primary point of contact, and utilizing your expertise in JavaScript and Amazon Web Services (AWS).  Roles & Responsibilities:1 Develop and maintain server-side applications using Node.js. 2 Proficiency in JavaScript, ES6+ features and asynchronous programming. 3 Optimize database performance and work with various database systems such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Redis. 4 Proficiency in Node.js frameworks like Express.js, Nest.js.5 Strong knowledge on RESTful API design. 6 Git expertise and experience with codebase management using Github.7 TDD/BDD using Jest, Mocha, Sinon. 8 Understanding of front-end technologies and their integration. 9 Proven experience with setting up CI/CD pipelines with jenkins. Monitor, troubleshoot, and maintain production systems using monitoring tools like New Relic.10 Should have 5 plus years of experience in Node JS.  Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Node.js, JavaScript, and Amazon Web Services (AWS). Strong understanding of software engineering principles and best practices. Experience with agile development methodologies and tools. Solid grasp of database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and React. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Node.js, JavaScript, and Amazon Web Services (AWS). The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful software solutions. Shift Timings:12 PM to 10 PM. Qualification 15 years full time education

column2: We are looking for a dynamic Engineering Team Lead to manage Passer s development efforts and day-to-day engineering operations. Your primary focus will be to act as a liaison between their team and upper management, ensuring that everyone is on the same page with regard to company goals and objectives, while overseeing a team of software engineers.                You will be a part of an agile development team, building and working on enterprise grade software systems on top of a mixed development stack - MERN, FERN, MongoDB, Next.js etc. You would be providing technical and team leadership through coaching and mentorship, by setting objectives, managing workflow, and ensuring that projects are completed on time and within budget.                  Role Responsibilities              Guide team development efforts towards successful project delivery.      Provide technical leadership to teammates through coaching and mentorship.      Maintain high standards of software quality within the team by establishing good practices and habits.      Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement within the team.      Collaborate with other software developers and product team to plan, design, develop, test, and maintain web-and desktop-based business applications built on MERN or FERN Stack.      Assist in the collection and documentation of users requirements, development of user stories, estimates and work plans.      Prepare reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation and maintenance of software.      Design, develop, and unit test applications in accordance with established standards.      Participate in peer-reviews of solution designs and related code.      Package and support deployment of releases.      Work with teammates in the migration of legacy applications to current technologies.      Develop, refine, and tune integrations between applications.      Analyze and resolve technical and application problems.      Assess opportunities for application and process improvement and prepare documentation of rationale to share with team members and other affected parties.      Adhere to high-quality development principles while delivering solutions on-time and on-budget.      Provide third-level support to business users.      Research and evaluate a variety of software products.                Role Requirements                    Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant experience.      Previous work experience as a Full-stack Developer and/or Software Architect      Proficient and experienced in using    Git    for    collaborative development & project managemen    t      Experience    designing and developing enterprise grade software        Experience with    source control management    systems and    continuous integration/deployment    environments      Experience with    automated testing        Experience with    agile development methodologies    including Kanban and Scrum      Experience with    multi-threading    and    concurrency        Experience with    debugging, performance profiling    and    optimization        Comprehensive understanding of object-oriented and service-oriented application development techniques and theories        Internally motivated    , able to work proficiently both independently and in a team environment      Strong    communication skills    with both internal team members and external business stakeholders FirestoreDB,      MongoDB,      Redis, MySQL    and    PostgreSQL        Experience with source control management systems and continuous integration/deployment environments      Familiar with column2: As a senior software engineer, you will be part of our People Technology team to help deliver world class software for our business partners.      You will report to the engineering manager and work as an individual contributor participating in designing and development of software. This role will have collaboration with business partners, multiple Visa IT teams and third-party vendors. The portfolio includes SaaS and hosted packaged applications such as Workday, Cornerstone, ADP, SmartRecruiters, ServiceNow, and some homegrown solutions.      We are looking for a Fullstack Developer that will design and develop high volume, low latency applications for mission-critical system, delivering high availability.      You will support web-based application development and maintenance and contribute to and grow our software engineering competency.      The Fullstack Developer must have broad experience in web application development.      If this sounds exciting, we want to chat and tell you more about our work culture and environment and see if this will be a good fit for both of us.      HR or Integration Services experience a distinct plus     The selected candidate must have excellent communication skills and strong organizational skills, be able to meet deadlines, as well as interact effectively with other developers, and management.            ?       Requirements & Skills:         Experience in full stack technology, in one or more of the following technologies - Java, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Angular, JavaScript, NoSQL, Maven, Design Patterns, Test Automation framework.      Expertise in front-end technologies, including JavaScript, CSS3 and HTML5 and third-party libraries such as ReactJS, Angular, jQuery and Less. js      Knowledge of multiple back-end languages (e. g. C#, Java, Python) and JavaScript frameworks (e. g. Angular, React, Node. js)     Experience with databases (e. g. MongoDB), web servers (e. g. Apache) and UI/UX design     Experience with agile development incorporating Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery, utilizing technologies such as GIT, Maven, and Jenkins.      Ability to create wireframes and responsive designs that result in a great user experience.      Expert building web applications from the ground up.      Develop code that aligns with design specifications and meets security and standard coding quality processes. Coding must adhere to all standards for security & quality, be easily maintainable and have high system performance.      Build conceptual architecture diagrams, design documents, maintain code repository, build unit/functional tests, and assist with code reviews.      Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve complex problems.

column2: Experian Consumer Services (ECS) is in search of a broadly experienced, roll-up-your-sleeves type of technologist to help us deliver our next generation B2B Digital Experience Platform (DXP).     More specifically we are seeking a skilled Salesforce Developer with a comprehensive understanding of various Salesforce platforms: Experience Cloud, Service Cloud, Commerce Cloud and Sales Cloud. You will be working in some of the most modern technology developing our new eCommerce platform from the ground up. Beyond Salesforce, a background in SOAP or RESTful integrations, front end, and backend development, Devops principles and knowledge of AWS services and integrations will be helpful as we deliver this platform.      This is a multi-year program so this role will be responsible for the design and development of the initial platform (12 months). Following that release, this role will be responsible for support of that platform while we deliver additional exciting capabilities to the platform.      You will be involved in all aspects of software delivery from sprint planning, standups and code reviews to architecture, design, and development. We need somebody who can interact with our Product Owner; taking a vision and turning it into a scalable solution. This role is more than just a senior engineer - the ideal candidate will be a true solution consultant. We need your ideas and your expertise.         Role Responsibility:         Plan, design, develop, and deploy solutions within an Agile/Scrum software delivery framework.     Collaborate with product teams across the organization to understand what needs to be solutioned.     Ensure that all solutions use the right tool for the job balancing declarative vs programmatic options while ensuring that our solution is secure and stable.      Evaluate complex business and technical requirements, communicating solutions to technical and non-technical business owners.     Engage in code and technical design reviews of solution implementations to ensure code quality and best practices are maintained.     Support bi-weekly release management using a CI/CD release process to test, validate and implement new features/code as we'll as updates to existing code.     Help to establish best practices including integration and application development, deployment, testing (unit, regression, and systems), and iterative refinement processes.     And have fun. Ensure that the attitude you bring to the team creates a challenging, rewarding, and enjoyable environment.          Education and Experience:         Bachelors degree in relevant field or equivalent experience.     7 to 10 years of experience with Salesforce development and 3 to 4 years of experience in Lightning framework.

column2: Who We Are At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward ??always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities. The Role Are you ready to take on an opportunity and make your mark with an established Rancher platform with unstoppable growth potential? Kyndryl is seeking a passionate and driven Rancher Kubernetes engineer?to join our team and break out of the hierarchy to rewrite the rules for what comes next. Kyndryl Container Consulting team have deep knowledge and extensive experience in delivering Enterprise Container Management (ECM) solutions to enterprise customers. SUSE Rancher Technical Consultants are our subject matter experts to ensure we provide world class consulting services to our customers.? ? A SUSE Rancher Technical Engineer will solve customer's business challenges through hands-on technical implementation with recommended? best practices. You??l need to have a balance of solid technical experience, knowledge of open-source technologies and solutions, and the ability to identify and solve issues at the enterprise level. A Technical Consultant?? technical skills and capabilities need to be balanced with very strong inter-personal skills, be able to work closely with our customers and become their trusted advisor. Your Future at Kyndryl Kyndryl has a global footprint, which means that as a Site Reliability Engineer at Kyndryl you will have opportunities to work on projects and collaborate with colleagues from around the world. This role is dynamic and influential ??offering a wide range of professional and personal growth opportunities that you won?? find anywhere else. Who You Are - Guide customer in building scalable and optimal solutions using SUSE Rancher ECM products with best practices. - Successful, collaborative delivery of customer projects as a technical lead. - Assist to troubleshoot and provide resolution or workaround to customer?? technical issues during project engagements. - Evaluate unique and complex deployments and make recommendations for optimisation. - Ability to work in customer?? environment and may at times be required to work outside of standard business hours. - Ability to handle tense/stressful situations regarding service outages and issue resolution. - Continuously learn, grow, and adapt to new skills and technologies. - Active engagement and knowledge sharing with our internal and external communities on lessons learned, best practices, and how-to??. - Ability to manage multiple issues and projects with shifting priorities and timelines. - Creation of SOP??, POC?? and automation to move quickly to IaC. Required Skills and Experience: 4+ years experience. - A strong combination of technical and customer-facing skills. - Knowledge of Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) cloud solutions. - Proven experience with Docker containers and Kubernetes, in particular Rancher. - Proven experience with cloud management and IT automation solutions. - Competent comprehension of enterprise architecture and strategic business drivers. - Experience deploying and managing Rancher/Kubernetes clusters at scale. - Develop scripts for system automation, and automation of manual tasks including using Ansible. - Deploy Rancher Kubernetes in on-prem and public cloud environments. - Be part of a team that will work providing level 2/3 support for Rancher Non-Prod and Prod Support. - CKA, CKAD, or CKS certifications an advantage. - Other relevant industry qualification is a plus. - Working variable shift timings. - Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex technical insights to both technical and non-technical audiences.- - Experience in troubleshooting in a technical environment. - Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. - Extensive experience in relevant technologies and customer environments. - Extensive experience in high-tech or software company. Preferred Skills and Experience - Kafka skills. - Experience in adopting Service Mesh (e.g. Istio) and/or API gateways on Kubernetes. - Experience in managing Container security with tools such as NeuVector, Aqua, Sysdig, Prisma Cloud etc. - Experience working in a DevOps environment. - Experience developing application deployment workflows (CI/CD) pipelines with Kubernetes. Being You Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it?? how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we??e not doing it single-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you ??and everyone next to you ??the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That?? the Kyndryl Way. What You Can Expect With state-of-the-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter ??wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee  learning?programs  give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications,  including?Microsoft,  Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non-profit organizations. ?At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed. Get Referred!   If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ??ow Did You Hear About Us??during the application process, select ??mployee Referral??and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

column2: We are looking for a talented and experienced Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Cloud Solution Architect to join our team. As a Cloud Solution Architect, you will be responsible for designing and implementing scalable, reliable, and secure cloud solutions on GCP to meet our business requirements and drive digital transformation initiatives.         Responsibilities:                 Work closely with clients, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to understand business needs, technical requirements, and solution objectives.                 Design end-to-end cloud architectures and solutions on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) that leverage GCP services and technologies to meet business and technical requirements.                 Develop architectural designs, diagrams, and documentation to illustrate cloud solution components, dependencies, and integration points.                 Lead technical discussions, workshops, and presentations with clients to articulate cloud solution designs, benefits, and implementation approaches.                 Collaborate with sales, pre-sales, and delivery teams to develop proposals, statements of work (SOWs), and project plans for cloud solution implementations.                 Provide technical leadership and guidance to implementation teams throughout the project lifecycle, including solution design, deployment, and optimization.                 Conduct architecture reviews, assessments, and audits to ensure alignment with best practices, industry standards, and security requirements.                 Stay updated on GCP services, features, and capabilities, and evaluate their applicability to client requirements and use cases.                 Support the development of cloud migration strategies, roadmaps, and business cases, and assist clients in planning and executing cloud migration projects.                 Serve as a subject matter expert (SME) on GCP cloud architecture, solutions, and best practices, and contribute to knowledge sharing and skills development initiatives.         Requirements:                 Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. Masters degree preferred.                 years of experience as a cloud solution architect, cloud consultant, or similar role, with a focus on designing and implementing cloud solutions on Google Cloud Platform (GCP).                 Google Cloud certification(s) such as Professional Cloud Architect, Associate Cloud Engineer, or equivalent.                 Strong proficiency in GCP services and technologies, including compute, storage, networking, databases, security, and identity/access management.                 Hands-on experience with cloud-native architectures, microservices, containerization, and orchestration technologies (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker, Google Kubernetes Engine - GKE).                 Expertise in designing and implementing scalable, reliable, and cost-effective cloud solutions that meet business and technical requirements.                 Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences.                 Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze complex issues, evaluate alternative solutions, and recommend optimal approaches.                 Experience working in a client-facing role, interacting with clients, stakeholders, and technical teams to gather requirements and define solution architectures.                 Proven track record of successfully delivering cloud projects from inception to completion, including solution design, deployment, and post-implementation support.                 Passion for continuous learning and professional development, with a desire to stay updated on emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in cloud computing.         Preferred Qualifications:                 Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.                 Additional certifications in cloud computing, architecture, or related areas (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert).                 Experience with other cloud platforms and providers, such as AWS, Azure, or multi-cloud environments.                 Familiarity with cloud migration methodologies, tools, and best practices for migrating workloads to GCP.                 Knowledge of cloud security, compliance, and governance frameworks, including industry standards (e.g., ISO 27001, SOC 2, GDPR) and regulatory requirements.

column2: What youll be doing As part of Verizons Experience Design team, youll have the chance to impact one of the largest consumer presences in America, supporting millions of daily customer interactions across an omnichannel ecosystem and a growing consumer product portfolio. With global offices and hybrid work environments, the team is assembling the brightest designers, design strategists, and product managers to collaborate with cross-disciplinary teams, shaping the future of the customer experience.  As a member of the Verizon Design Systems team, you will drive the continued evolution and adoption of a world-class, multi-channel Design System comprising a visual language, an interaction language, a verbal and audio language, patterns for use, and coded templates and components for implementation. The Design System team provides creative direction, interfaces with teams across our B2C, B2B, Media, Technology, and Marketing divisions, and is accountable for the successful development and integration of the Design System into hundreds of millions of dollars of development work that enables billions of customer touchpoints.  As a Senior Engineer Consultant, you will code and create the visual front-end elements of the design system component library, documentation, and usage guidelines within the Verizon Design System.  You will be responsible for developing solutions to system initiatives, scripting coding, and testing component interfaces, and resolving issues occurring within programming independently. Working with partners in product, technology, and business, you will collaborate on a wide range of design programs or products. Your day-to-day responsibilities may include:  Creating patterns for the Verizon Design System to create a consistent user experience. Thoroughly exploring, refining, and documenting the development solutions. Actively exploring user context, and engaging in target user activities when possible. Participating in insight-gathering activities (informal or formal, primary or secondary) and creating solutions that leverage user insights. Actively researching competitive products, industry trends, and topics,  and recommending activities, solutions, and methods to guide team members and stakeholders Staying updated on Verizon's business, strategy, and organizational structure.  Effectively designing solutions within Verizon's business context and revenue model.  Maintaining a working knowledge of UI standards for common platforms (iOS, Android, Web).  Working within Verizon's front-end and back-end technology constraints and capabilities.  Giving and receiving constructive feedback. Communicating the current project plan, goals, and expected outcomes. Articulating user, business, and/or technical reasoning for detailed design decisions in critiques or presentations. Mentoring peers and new hires by sharing experiences and processes to enable growth. Identifying project needs and engaging stakeholders in conversation to fully understand needs. Presenting work and engaging in constructive dialogue with stakeholders to understand the context of tasks and ensure strong design rationale.  Contributing to recommendations for shaping appropriate user insight-gathering activities (informal or formal, primary or secondary). Playing  a  role in evolving the design system by proposing updates and participating in feedback opportunities Exploring, refining, and documenting engineering solutions while adhering to design system guidelines Participate in the interview and evaluation process as requested, based on the interview approach defined by the team. What were looking for Youll need to have:  Bachelors degree or four or more years of work experience.  Four or more years of relevant work experience. Experience with Agile software delivery environments. Experience with common design software (Figma, Adobe, etc.). Experience with UI Architecture, Responsive design, SPA, and/or Design Patterns.  Experience front-end technologies of React JS and TypeScript.  Experience writing code and maintainable software. Experience with web performance, web accessibility, release cycle management, CI/CD pipeline, and/or SDLC Process. Even better if you have one or more of the following: Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science. Portfolio of professional work. Experience with Agile software delivery environments. Contributed to multiple design programs or shipped products with a large user base. Contributed to overall product success. Experience with Fortune 500 organizational environments. Experience with  Redux, React Native, JavaScript (ES5, ES6), Object Oriented JavaScript, Webpack, Rollup, Ajax, SCSS, Styled Component, HTML5, and/or CSS3.  Experience Micro Frontend, Next JS. column2: In this position you will design, plan, integrate, test and commission software applications for Advanced Distribution Management Systems (ADMS) and Outage Management Systems (OMS) for utility clients.              Your Impact         Technical leadership and face of Aspentech for projects in the ADMS portfolio.         Implementation of control systems at electric utilities that improve their efficiency to operate the modern grid while ensuring contract requirements and specifications are met.          Participate in design, planning, and execution of ADMS projects.          Installation and configuration of advanced distribution management applications such as Distribution Power Flow (DPF), Fault Location Isolation & Service Restoration (FLISR), and Volt/VAR Control & Optimization (VVC/VVO) and OMS.         Support testing events with the customer.          Work closely with Aspentech development teams to troubleshoot, prioritize, and test product changes.          Interface with the utility s Geographic Information System (GIS) teams to extract, translate, and load the electrical network model to the Distribution Management System.         Configure and integrate software components to meet contract requirement specifications and test with customers.          Train customers on how to operate the systems being delivered.          Provide technical support to troubleshoot and resolve issues observed on live systems.                      What You'll Need         Bachelor's degree in      Electrical     Engineering or related technical field experience.         Minimum 5 years of experience project engineering/ similar Application Engineering role; high level of experience troubleshooting complex systems and software applications.         Knowledge of system designs, computer systems, engineering practices, and control systems.         Understanding of Electric Distribution Power Systems and modelling is preferred (Load Flow Studies, Coordination Studies, Arc Flash Studies).                 Preferred Requirements             Master s degree in Power Systems Engineering or related field.         Programming and scripting experience (C/python).         Database and data structure knowledge and experience (SQL, XML, Mongo, GIS).         Operations or engineering experience at an electric utility.         Industry experience with Outage Management Systems (OMS).       Strong communication skill, both verbally and written.     Proven ability to organize and prioritize work within tight timelines.
column11: GIS, Distribution management, Management systems, XML, Dms, Troubleshooting, Application software, Technical support, SQL, Python

column2: Marvell switching solutions in NSX team have been driving a change in networks from the traditional methods of simply moving bits to delivering exciting services and applications. By delivering a stream of technical innovations through a diverse set of fast growing product lines, Marvell technology is powering the next generation network.            ?       Job Responsibilities:         The Marvell Network Switching Group (NSX) is seeking a software engineering leader to manage the next generation of software product offerings for Enterprise and Data Center Networks.      You will play a key role in defining, implementing, and leading teams to deliver our switch silicon SDK, ecosystem open software package, and/or network operating systems software. For both Enterprise and Data Center networks, a leadership semiconductor product line requires a deployment-first view of the customer end-market application.     This starts with an understanding of the network level service offering, how it is partitioned into cloud and in-field system software, and an appreciation for the development constraints customers face in delivering a broad and differentiated product line efficiently and across a wide base of applications.      Working in partnership with the product team, you will develop, communicate, and implement a vision for a software team which can deliver solutions to these challenges, influence the evolution of the software product architecture, plus define, deliver, and maintain a software release roadmap which delivers to tier-1 customer requirements.     This role requires strong technical and management insight to balance staffing tradeoffs with technical/roadmap considerations and to set organization plans which match customer needs to team capacity.      The leader is required to drive long term staffing plans and organizational budgets anticipating customer needs based on market trends in the absence of direct customer feedback.              Role Responsibilities:            In cooperation with product management, research and comprehend a long-term vision for customer platforms using standard product networking silicon, and the specific opportunities for the Marvell switch software platform.         In cooperation with the architecture team, research, define, communicate, and implement evolutionary changes to the Marvell switching software product portfolio to meet customer needs.         Actively manage to the software product roadmap for driver, SDK, NOS, or agent software packages, ensuring that releases occur on schedule with desired quality.         Lead and manage a software development team, which may be distributed across multiple global sites.         Work directly with customers to service near-term support requests and to understand long term requirements for the product software offering.          Working in partnership with company stakeholders, define and implement a long-term growth and development plan for the team, anticipating near-term and long-term market requirements and the required skillsets necessary for product competitiveness and to meet market needs.               Requirements:           BS in engineering, computer science, computer systems engineering, or network engineering.         Minimum 15 years of work experience in software development for semiconductor standard products for networking or routing applications or in network operating systems (NOS) software for networking equipment.         Minimum 10 years management experience leading software engineering teams employing a cadence release methodology.         Demonstrated expertise with the modern network switch software stack, including network function virtualization, open-source NOS, hardware abstraction layer (HAL) approaches for functional abstraction, software-defined networking (SDN) control partitioning, and stack architecture for modularity & reuse.          Familiar with cloud-based network control software, which may include cloud-managed enterprise network controllers, service-provider network orchestration management software, or cloud data center instrumentation and control software.
column11: Product management, Semiconductor, Helpdesk, Staffing, SDK, System software, Open source, Virtualization, Automotive

column2: Role & responsibilities   Job Title: Principal Software Engineer Job Location: Bangalore-Karnataka, India Job Mode: Permanent/Direct company payroll Working Mode: Hybrid Working Days: 5 days Interview Mode: Virtual Principal Software Engineer (C++, Windows) Architects, Designs, Algorithms, Data Structures, OOPs ( 10 -14 years)  The Principal Software Engineer position is a high visibility role requiring daily interaction with Engineering Teams, and Executive Management.   The role demands diverse engineering & leadership capabilities including the ability to communicate & collaborate effectively within & other global teams to gather requirements, generate clear specifications, brainstorm solutions & create new or existing products as per the business needs.   QUALIFICATIONS 10-14 years of industry experience with a demonstrated ability in problem-solving, effectively diagnosing technical issues and proposing reasonable solutions. Must have experience in Desktop application development. Proficiency in Text-Based Programming languages, preferably C++. Strong understanding and experience of software design principles. Demonstrated ability to lead project teams through the release cycle(s). Track record of being a technical expert with extraordinary implementation skills.    Preferred Qualifications Understanding of software tools (i.e. LabVIEW, TestStand). Understanding of Agile software development principles. Demonstrated ability to: Persistently drive tasks and lead projects to successful completion. Effectively interact and communicate with engineering teams and management. Work effectively in a diverse, multi-cultural group development environment. Problem-solving skills, including effectively diagnosing technical issues and proposing reasonable solutions. Take initiative, be a self-starter, and work independently.   Job Responsibilities Specifies, Architects, Designs, Implements and tests features and capabilities for existing and upcoming releases. Work in an Agile team, environment to prioritize tasks and leverage resources to deliver features in a release on time. Collaborate with product stakeholders in different geographical locations on design discussion and code architecture. Implement and test features to ensure a high level of code quality. Work with the team to prioritize tasks and leverage resources to deliver features in a release on time. Identify key risks to projects and propose mitigation options. Define processes, tools and technologies for the team. Review feature specifications and design proposals. Set coding guidelines and provide effective code reviews. Evaluate project testing strategies and contribute to writing effective test plans. Identify, prioritize and resolve technical debt in the team. Decision maker for technical problems on his/her area of expertise across product line; reviews decisions and recommendations from junior engineers within the team. Guide and direct day-to-day work of junior engineers in the team, by modelling the values and behaviours of a successful engineer, by setting clear, observable, measurable expectations, and coaching them to develop skills and knowledge. Identify tools and infrastructure and contribute to processes in the team to improve engineering productivity. Works and interacts in R&D software and hardware organizations, as well as other business groups across the globe. Uses his/her technical influence to drive innovation and engineering standards/best practices across groups. Reviews and approves product specifications and customer user documentation for the product. Decision maker for technical problems on his/her area of expertise across product line; reviews decisions and recommendations from junior engineers within the team.  Interested candidate please apply here and as well send your resume to  chidananda@manpower.co.in; hr.chida@yahoo.com; Best Regards, HR Manpower Group Services Pvt. Ltd. Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits
